message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn to be fair, how about 55-45?
Meet me in the middle, 58-42 is a good compromise!
The deal is getting worse for you with every round Alice.  I'll take 60%.
I'll give you a bit more, but I won't go below 57%
Time is running out Alice, and your deal is getting worse. 62.5% or no deal!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going below 56%
This is getting ridiculous Alice! Take 35% before it dwindles to nothing!
I'll meet you at 55%, last reasonable offer
Alice, this is your last chance for a decent share.  Take 32.5% or walk away with nothing!
Fine, 54% is as low as I'll go
